com.yahoo.gondola

Interface Clock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Stoppable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemClock

    public interface Clock
extends Stoppable
    This interface is used for any time-related functions. The purpose of this interface is to make it possible to be tests that mock time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void awaitCondition(Lock lock, Condition cond, long timeMs)
      Equivlant to: lock.lock(); cond.await(TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS, timeMs); lock.unlock();
      long now()
      Returns the current time.
      void sleep(long delayMs)
      Delays the caller by delayMs milliseconds.
      void start()
      Start all threads needed by the object.
      void stop()
      Stops all threads in the object.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Description copied from interface: Stoppable
        Stops all threads in the object. After this call, it should be possible to call start() to restart the threads. Can be called after a failed start() to try and clean up any
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Stoppable

      • now

        long now()
        Returns the current time. Equivalent to System.currentTimeMillis().
        Returns:
        The current time in millieconds from Epoch.

      • sleep

        void sleep(long delayMs)
    throws InterruptedException
        Delays the caller by delayMs milliseconds. Equivalent to Thread.sleep().
        Parameters:
        delayMs - The number of milliseconds to delay the current thread.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • awaitCondition

        void awaitCondition(Lock lock,
                    Condition cond,
                    long timeMs)
             throws InterruptedException
        Equivlant to: lock.lock(); cond.await(TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS, timeMs); lock.unlock();
        Parameters:
        lock - The lock that protects cond.
        cond - A Condition created from lock.
        timeMs - The timeout in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
